QuestData.Title: Through the Dream
QuestData.Description: Alysra's plan might be necessary, $n. I don't know how much longer we can hold off the cultists.$B$BFandral Staghelm is bound by powerful spells. He won't be able to escape you, even inside the Emerald Dream.$B$BBeware, though, for all we know the nightmare has spread to this part of the world inside the dream.$B$BTake Fandral to the surface and hand him to Alysra. Let us hope he's more secure in Moonglade than he is here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver Arch Druid Fandral Staghelm to Alysra at the entrance of the Barrow Dens in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: You did well, $n. I will take Fandral to Moonglade myself.$B$BHis prison will be far enough from the battlefront there.
